opinions.text:
ORDER
The motion for counsel fee is granted and counsel Robert B. Mann is awarded the sum of $804 for services performed on behalf of defendant before this court.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Lawrence M. Iacoi, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Mann & Roney, Robert B. Mann, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. James RODERICK.
No. 78-268-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 13, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Lawrence M. Iacoi, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Mann & Roney, Robert B. Mann, Providence, for defendant.
